roleset.name: come up with

example.name: simple transitive
example.text: Lawmakers representing some of the cleaner utilities have been quietly working with the White House to devise ways to tinker with the administration bill to address their acid - rain concerns .

propbank.arg: Lawmakers representing some of the cleaner utilities
ways to tinker with the administration bill to address their acid - rain concerns

example.name: with 2dy predication
example.text: Keeping the mood light , the two then chanted and chortled their way through some murderous polyrhythms , devised by Mr. Douglas as an alternative to Hindemith 's dry theory - teaching techniques , and then , with Mr. Gomez , soared and improvised on the composer 's tight `` Bebop Etudes . ''

propbank.arg: as an alternative to Hindemith 's dry theory - teaching techniques

example.name: with purpose
example.text: They devised a 69 - point scale -- awarding one point for each subskill measured on the CAT test -- to rate the closeness of test preparatives to the fifth - grade CAT .

propbank.arg: -- awarding one point for each subskill measured on the CAT test --
to rate the closeness of test preparatives to the fifth - grade CAT

example.name: watch for to-clauses
example.text: The system worked the way we devised it to work . ''

roleset.note: DEVISE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'devise' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from devise.01-v predicate notes)
